about_the_game:
Slasher is a Retro third person multiplayer thriller game where you play as either a civilian or the Slasher. Run, hide and outlast the other players while being hunted by the Slasher. A random player chosen to be the Slasher must hunt down and eliminate the other players before time runs out. Unlock new Slasher skins after winning matches to customize your killer. Choose from three different maps to play in, The Suburbs, The Farm, and The Lake. Play multiple game modes with your friends, including Classic, Crowded, Imposter, Hide and Seek game modes.
Classic Game Mode: A timed event. Civilians must survive to win. The Slasher must kill all other players before the timer runs out to win.
Crowded Game Mode: Within a crowd of NPCs Civilians must hide in plain sight to escape the Slasher. The Slasher must find and kill the Real Players before the Time Runs Out to Win.
Imposter Game Mode: The Slasher can turn into a civilian and must eliminate all other players. The other players must find and stop the killer when he is hiding as a civilian.
Hide Game Mode: A classic game of Hide and Seek, but those who are found are Killed! The Slasher must find all of the Civilians before the time runs out.
